Test Name: Neuro-Oncology Expanded Gene Panel with Rearrangement, Tumor
Specimen Type: Fresh or formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue
Purpose: To analyze tumor DNA for mutations and gene rearrangements using an expanded neuro-oncology gene panel, ensuring accurate results for patient care.
Container: Sterile container for fresh tissue or FFPE tissue block
Equipment: Nucleic acid extraction instruments; Next-Generation Sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent); Thermal cycler; Microplate/fluorescence reader
